name: Breast Skin Thickening
description: Thickening of the skin in the breast region.

attributes.name: Presence of Breast Skin Thickening
attributes.description: Whether the breast skin thickening is present or absent.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: The status of the breast skin thickening.

values.name: New
values.description: The breast skin thickening is new.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The breast skin thickening has not changed.

values.name: Increased
values.description: The breast skin thickening has increased.

values.name: Decreased
values.description: The breast skin thickening has decreased.

values.name: Resolved
values.description: The breast skin thickening has resolved.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: The location of the breast skin thickening.

values.name: Right breast
values.description: The breast skin thickening is in the right breast.

values.name: Left breast
values.description: The breast skin thickening is in the left breast.

values.name: Bilateral
values.description: The breast skin thickening is in both breasts.

attributes.name: Extent
attributes.description: The extent of the breast skin thickening.

values.name: Localized
values.description: The breast skin thickening is localized.

values.name: Diffuse
values.description: The breast skin thickening is diffuse.

attributes.name: Thickness
attributes.description: The thickness of the breast skin thickening.

attributes.name: Nipple retraction
attributes.description: Whether nipple retraction is present or absent.

attributes.name: Nipple inversion
attributes.description: Whether nipple inversion is present or absent.

attributes.name: Lymphedema
attributes.description: Whether lymphedema is present or absent.

attributes.name: Breast Mass
attributes.description: Whether a breast mass is present or absent.

attributes.name: Axillary Lymphadenopathy
attributes.description: Whether axillary lymphadenopathy is present or absent.

attributes.name: Breast Calcifications
attributes.description: Whether breast calcifications are present or absent.
